name: TONL
title: Token-Optimized Notation Language
description: A text-first, LLM-friendly serialization format. Up to 50% fewer tokens than JSON. Zero dependencies. Built for the AI era.

name: SpecPulse
title: Build Software 10x Faster with AI
description: SpecPulse transforms how you build software. Write specifications once, generate intelligent tasks, and let AI handle the implementation. From idea to production in minutes, not months.

name: VLD
title: Ultra-fast TypeScript Validation
description: VLD is a blazing-fast, type-safe validation library with zero dependencies, 27+ language support, and full Zod API compatibility.
